alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 22 at 2:45AM PDT until April 23 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern Elko County and Southeastern Elko County. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 11 AM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Blowing snow could also reduce visibility, especially along mountain passes and summits. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Look for strongest wind to be situated in the eastern section of Elko County were winds could impact that portion of the US-93 and I-80 corridor clear through the overnight of Friday.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Southeastern Elko County
